content.description: Tricky climbing up the column to the base of the bulge sets you up for two finger pulling at its finest.  You may want to skip the last clip, don't whip if you do though.
content.location: Right most route at the Happy place.  If you walk the main Mondo trail and follow the switchbacks to the cliff, you will be standing at the base of this route.  A black bulge on a column.

content.description:
Start left of "Super Love Bliss Machine". Climb the nice face just left of the corner, and gain the corner/crack/bulge at the fourth bolt. Layback and stem up the corner, then climb straight up and over the bulge(crux) to a short slab to the anchor.

Be careful clipping the high second bolt(groundfall potential here).

Also a bit of a runout above the last bolt to the anchor.

Great Fun!
content.protection: 6 bolts, Metolius rap bolts for anchor.

content.description: Worth doing, this technical line starts with the crux move - getting off the ground into a thin dihedral.  After you are off the ground, use the thin holds to navigate up into the corner.  Gets easier the higher you get.  Perhaps worth two stars for the climbing in the mid section and particularly recommended if you like really technical climbing.
content.location: Located on the left side of the wall, much further to the left from the short wave that is Super-Love Bliss Machine.  Wade through the tall grass to the base.  Look for the thin dihedral above.
